entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy and snow squalls ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
